Subjects: Luke, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St Luke, in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
crystis ewangeliste sancte lucasas of nacion cyrus
                    was…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& þare to helpe þat I hyne twynbut schame det
                    & deydly syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.119-20.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.246-8.
